abstract: National pride campaign carried out by Venezuelan government on social media carries photo of Miami Herald reporter Jim Wyss with caption extolling country's welcome of foreigners; selection of photo seems uninformed, as Wyss was detained by Venezuelan authorities for 48 hours in 2013.
lead_paragraph: Jim Wyss, a reporter for The Miami Herald, was surprised to see a picture of himself after his release from Venezuelan detention being used in a campaign for national pride.
snippet: Jim Wyss, a reporter for The Miami Herald, was surprised to see a picture of himself after his release from Venezuelan detention being used in a campaign for national pride.

headline.main: Odd Photo Choice for Venezuela Promotional Effort
headline.print_headline: Odd Photo Choice for Venezuela Promotional Effort
